mapper.select: SELECT board_idx, title, hit_cnt, creator_id, DATE_FORMAT(created_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS created_date FROM board WHERE deleted_yn = 'N' ORDER BY board_idx DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (title, contents, created_date, creator_id) VALUES ( #{title}, #{contents}, NOW(), 'TESTER' )
